desc: Providing high quality blends, herbs, flowers and oils, using sustainable and eco-friendly packaging. We offer artisan handmade herbal tea blends made with love by two best friends, in hand-stamped and compostable packaging.

💚🌳We work with Eden Reforestation Projects to plant mangrove trees in Madagascar. Help create livelihoods for thousands of people currently living in extreme poverty by empowering them to restore and protect forests on a massive scale while offsetting your personal carbon footprint.🌳💚
